_sText:
After almost two years of procrastination and hard work, here's my first completed map. Moderate difficulty with lots of attention payed to detail. Quite a big map with bonus and LJ section. I made this with legit bhop in mind, but it should be fine for auto as well.

Huge thanks to George and Badges (as well as Keyuu). Without their assistance and patience, I don't think this map ever would have neared completion.

I've learned lots while making this and hope you all enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed creating it. 

Cheers, 

Ntag
